update RESOURCE_KEY

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update RESOURCE_KEY set MAC = #{mac,jdbcType=CHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, MANUFACTURER_ID = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_INT1 = #{rInt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, R_INT2 = #{rInt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM1 = #{num1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUM2 = #{num2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VC1 = #{vc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VC2 = #{vc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHR1 = #{chr1,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHR2 = #{chr2,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
